discourse_list.title: [Proposal] Increase DAI on Optimism via QiDao Partnership

content.content: Brief Summary QiDao wants to partner with MakerDAO to increase the amount of DAI on Optimism via Velodrome bribes from QiDao. This proposal was made in partnership with MakerDAO’s Growth Core Unit.  TL;DR on Issue MakerDAO is currently using its voting power to vote for DAI/USDC and DAI/OP LP rewards on Optimism. No other protocol is voting for or bribing those LPs. As a result, the amount of DAI locked on Velodrome has stagnated (see chart below).  840×342 36.7 KB                         DAI liquidity on Velodrome   TL;DR on Proposed Partnership The way liquidity works on Solidly-like DEXs, you do much better when you partner with others. MakerDAO can increase the amount of votes to DAI by 64.24% by allocating votes to DAI-MAI instead of just DAI-USDC. Below is the proposed voting distribution. Before:  DAI-USDC: 100% of votes  After:  DAI-USDC: 60% of votes DAI-MAI: 40% of votes  Overall votes to DAI stable LPs are expected to increase by 2M, which represents a 64% increase. See chart below for breakdown.   Solution Details QiDao has started a trial bribing exercise to see how many votes it can attract to a MAI-DAI LP. During the first vote, 1.8M votes were collected. This is expected to stabilize to 2M votes as bribes continue. Here’s how it would work if Maker and QiDao partnered on the pool:  QiDao bribes MAI-DAI pool with $1,000 / week Maker votes for the MAI-DAI pool with its VELO Maker recycles the bribes received from QiDao. This increases the overall pool’s bribes The pool now receives more votes than it would if Maker just voted for a pool. And more than if QiDao bribed the pool alone
content.GPT-summary: The proposal suggests a partnership between QiDao and MakerDAO to increase the amount of DAI on Optimism via Velodrome bribes from QiDao. The proposal explains how MakerDAO can increase the amount of votes to DAI by 64.24% by allocating votes to DAI-MAI instead of just DAI-USDC. QiDao has started a trial bribing exercise to see how many votes it can attract to a MAI-DAI LP. The post also includes charts to illustrate the current situation and the expected outcome of the proposed partnership.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Totally supported. There will be a win-win partnership between two protocols.
Hi @Benjamin918 thanks for the proposal, we will likely need a bit to evaluate internally but will for sure come back to you. cheers schuppi

quick update: we ran some numbers and think it is worth a shot. We intend to apply the proposed voting change starting with the current epoche - but we will cover this topic in todays G&R call to give everyone the chance to chime in.

The DAI-MAI is live on Velodrome! Here is some information about the pair we posted on twitter   twitter.com    Qi Dao @QiDaoProtocol  Ready to race? @QiDaoProtocol and @MakerDAO are teaming up to pedal more liquidity for $MAI and $DAI on @optimismFND !  🚀 Introducing the new boost for the sAMM-DAI/MAI pool on @VelodromeFI https://t.co/yweWzrBgb6         6:13 PM - 22 Feb 2023           1
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal
